item.title: Danish pension fund to sell $100 million in Treasurys, citing 'poor' U.S. government finances
item.description: AkademikerPension's move comes amid increasing tensions between Denmark and the U.S. over Greenland.

item.title: JPMorgan sees big gains for two stocks in a unique industry: water dredging
item.description: JPMorgan initiated research coverage of Orion Group and Great Lakes Dredge & Dock with overweight ratings.

item.title: Raymond James upgrades this ‘Magnificent Seven’ titan as AI-driven growth accelerates
item.description: Raymond James' new price target upside of more than 20%.

item.title: The Vegas Sphere parent is gaining momentum. BTIG says buy the stock
item.description: BTIG's $110 price target implies that shares of Sphere Entertainment could rally 18% from here.

item.title: Jefferies says to buy the dip in Meta, reiterates stock as top pick
item.description: Jefferies' $910 price target offers upside of 48% for shares of Meta.
